channel.title: Exion editing!
channel.description:
Heya!
I'm working on a little project! :) This project includes to take a really nice server which has been "abandoned" and to keep adding awesome features. The server will be downloadable at the end. I wont change original name. The author has made it "leechable". This will be really useful for new people which are all interested in making donator shops/points and much more cool stuff like so.. :P
[b]*NOTE[/b] if you want me to add something special, just post a comment and i'll add it! :) [hr] Type: 317 Project Insanity Base: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443234.0.html][PI] Exion 317[/url] Author: Exion Anti-Leech from author: NO [hr] [b][u]07/04/12: DONE[/u][/b]
-Edited Quest tab. -Added Donator Points. -Made a Donator shop. -Added points command.
[i]Quest Tab:[/i] [img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/205752questtab.png[/img]
[i]Shop:[/i] [Img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/926339theshop.png[/img]
[i]Command:[/i] [img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/692156thecommand.png[/img]
[youtube]http://youtu.be/eWm7H47jHQI[/youtube]
[hr]
[b][u]Currently working on:[/u][/b] -Pk Points, -Pk Points Shop, -Fixing the Mining bugs, (some ore combinations are not good -> 2 coals gives you adamant bar) -Adding 2-3 quest's, -Adding Items such as, (Dragon Claws, Chaotic items, etc) -Adding Donator Status, -Adding Staff zone/donator zone, -Fixing yell command, -Some more,
Once again, this is not my server. This is only a little project that i'm having fun with. And i know that new players will be really happy about these new features. [b]If you have some nice ideas, post it please! :)[/b]

item.title: Exion editing!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@dzeko, theres guides on all of the dupes btw cause I remember fixing them all. I would give you a copy of the source but I no longer have it:o(i didn’t archive files at the time).

Read full topic

item.title: Exion editing!
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:2, topic:438887”]First source I ever worked on properly and I loved it, good luck!
Btw theres soooo many dupes, quite a few bugs too.
Bit outdated tbh but gl :)[/quote]
This is one of my first source that i really appreciate to work on.
Didn’t though about dupes!
This little project helps me to get a lot more experience in java.
Thank you!

Exion:

Good luck!

Thanks man!
Really nice sources you’ve made there!

Read full topic

item.title: Exion editing!
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

Heya!

I’m working on a little project!
This project includes to take a really nice server which has been “abandoned” and to keep
adding awesome features. The server will be downloadable at the end. I wont change original name.
The author has made it “leechable”.
This will be really useful for new people which are all interested in making
donator shops/points and much more cool stuff like so…

*NOTE
if you want me to add something special, just post a comment and i’ll add it!
[hr]
Type: 317 Project Insanity
Base: [PI] Exion 317
Author: Exion
Anti-Leech from author: NO

07/04/12: DONE

-Edited Quest tab.
-Added Donator Points.
-Made a Donator shop.
-Added points command.

Currently working on:
-Pk Points,
-Pk Points Shop,
-Fixing the Mining bugs, (some ore combinations are not good -> 2 coals gives you adamant bar)
-Adding 2-3 quest’s,
-Adding Items such as, (Dragon Claws, Chaotic items, etc)
-Adding Donator Status,
-Adding Staff zone/donator zone,
-Fixing yell command,
-Some more,

Once again, this is not my server. This is only a little project that i’m having fun with.
And i know that new players will be really happy about these new features.
If you have some nice ideas, post it please!
